definition: to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend

sentences.english: You can sort the table on any of the columns in ascending or descending order.
sentences.chinese: 这个表格可以按任何列的升序或降序排序。

sentences.english: Sorts the elements of a sequence in descending order by using a specified comparer.
sentences.chinese: 使用指定的比较器按降序对序列的元素排序。

sentences.english: Click a column heading to sort the table in ascending or descending order.
sentences.chinese: 单击一个列标题可以按升序或降序对表进行排序。

sentences.english: In one of the last steps, arrange the equivalent service names in the descending order of the ranks.
sentences.chinese: 在最后几步之中，依照序列来降序排列等价服务名。

sentences.english: The third step is to order the cluster in descending order of their cluster frequencies.
sentences.chinese: 第三步是按集群依赖关系的降序对集群进行排序。

sentences.english: All page elements are listed in descending order from the amount of response time for each element.
sentences.chinese: 所有的页面单元都按照各自响应时间的大小降序排列。

sentences.english: You may sort this column in ascending or descending order.
sentences.chinese: 可以对这一列按升序或降序排序。

definition: tab window (in a web browser etc)/paging/pagination/page break (computing)
